functionalj.lens.lenses.java.time

Interface PeriodAccess<HOST>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AccessCreator<HOST,Period,PeriodAccess<HOST>>, AnyAccess<HOST,Period>, ChronoPeriodAccess<HOST,Period>, ConcreteAccess<HOST,Period,PeriodAccess<HOST>>, Func1<HOST,Period>, Function<HOST,Period>, TemporalAmountAccess<HOST,Period>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    PeriodLens
    Functional Interface:
    This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.

    @FunctionalInterface
public interface PeriodAccess<HOST>
extends AnyAccess<HOST,Period>, ChronoPeriodAccess<HOST,Period>, ConcreteAccess<HOST,Period,PeriodAccess<HOST>>
